meanings.definition: To take more tricks than necessary in a card game.
meanings.sent1: During the game, he tends to overtrick, winning more tricks than he needs.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally overtricked and ended up losing the game.
meanings.sent3: The overtrick master mistakenly won all the tricks and still lost.
meanings.sent4: His strategy to overtrick his opponents backfired, leading to his defeat.
meanings.sent5: Overtricking can sometimes lead to unexpected losses in card games.

meanings.definition: An extra trick taken in a card game.
meanings.sent1: He secured the win with an impressive overtrick at the end.
meanings.sent2: The overtrick gave her the lead in the card game competition.
meanings.sent3: The overtrick was so unexpected that it left everyone amazed.
meanings.sent4: The overtrick became the highlight of the entire card game.
meanings.sent5: The overtrick secured his reputation as a skilled card player.

meanings.definition: To outdo in trickery or deceit.
meanings.sent1: She tried to overtrick her opponent by pretending to have a weak hand.
meanings.sent2: He managed to overtrick his rival with a clever bluff.
meanings.sent3: The overtrickster's plan to deceive backfired spectacularly.
meanings.sent4: His attempt to overtrick his friend in the game was unsuccessful.
meanings.sent5: Overtricking in deceit can lead to broken trust in relationships.
